mapper.select: SELECT r.* , m.MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM REVIEW_TBL r JOIN MEMBER_TBL m ON r.MEMBER_NO = m.MEMBER_NO WHERE PERFUME_NO = #{perfumeNo }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ALERT_TBL VALUES ( SEQ_ALERT_NO.NEXTVAL , '재입고' , #{memberNo } , #{perfumeNo } , NULL , NULL , DEFAULT , NULL , DEFAULT )
mapper.update: UPDATE PERFUME_TBL SET PERFUME_QUANTITY = PERFUME_QUANTITY - (SELECT CART_QUANTITY FROM CART_TBL WHERE CART_NO = #{cartNo }) WHERE PERFUME_NO = (SELECT PERFUME_NO FROM CART_TBL WHERE CART_NO = #{cartNo })
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ALERT_TBL WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo } AND A_CLICK_STATUS = 0 AND ALERT_DATE IS NOT NULL

SELECT a.* , p.PERFUME_BRAND, p.PERFUME_NAME , r.REVIEW_CONTENTS , m.MEMBER_NICKNAME AS LIKE_MEMBER_NICKNAME , c.COMMENT_CONTENT AS P_COMMENT_CONTENT FROM ALERT_TBL a LEFT OUTER JOIN PERFUME_TBL p ON a.PERFUME_NO = p.PERFUME_NO AND a.ALERT_CATEGORY = '재입고' LEFT OUTER JOIN REVIEW_TBL r ON a.REVIEW_NO = r.REVIEW_NO AND (a.ALERT_CATEGORY = '좋아요' OR a.ALERT_CATEGORY = '댓글') LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER_TBL m ON a.PERFUME_NO = m.MEMBER_NO AND a.ALERT_CATEGORY = '좋아요' LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMENT_TBL c ON a.P_COMMENT_NO = c.COMMENT_NO AND a.ALERT_CATEGORY = '답댓글' WHERE a.A_CLICK_STATUS = 0 AND a.ALERT_DATE IS NOT NULL AND a.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo } ORDER BY ALERT_DATE DESC
SELECT p.* FROM MBTI_TBL m JOIN PERFUME_TBL p ON m.PERFUME_NO = p.PERFUME_NO WHERE MBTI = #{mbtiResult }
